description: The only object in the nova system that belongs to users is a keypair.  As part of the move to "tenants", the idea is that users are only used for auditing and logging, and resources should belong to tenants.  This requires changing the database and migrating existing keypairs to a particular tenant.
title: Keypairs should belong to tenants, not users

comments.content: The only object in the nova system that belongs to users is a keypair.  As part of the move to "tenants", the idea is that users are only used for auditing and logging, and resources should belong to tenants.  This requires changing the database and migrating existing keypairs to a particular tenant.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content: I think this is out of date with the keystone split. Marking as invalid.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
